Installation & Setup

Get started with PHP development environment setup using Laragon.

PHP Syntax & Variables

Learn how to write your first PHP script and store data in variables.

Control Structures

Master if/else statements, switch cases, and conditional logic in PHP.

Arrays & Loops

What you will learn

  • Understand PHP tags <?php?>
  • Datatypes: String, Integer, Array
  • Declare and use variables

Implementation Guide

Learn how to write your first PHP script and store data in variables.

Step 1: Create a PHP file

Create 'index.php' in 'C:/laragon/www/team-php/'

Step 2: Write code 

<?php
  $greeting = "Hello, Laragon!";
  $year = 2025;
  echo $greeting . " Welcome to " . $year;
  ?>

Step 3: Run it

Open browser: http://learn-php.test

Common Issues

Learn how to write your first PHP script and store data in variables.

White screen / 500 Error

Check for missing semicolons (;) at end of lines.

Variables not showing

Ensure you use the $ sign before variable names.
